channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 18:16 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aircraft bombs (cabin). Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 18:16 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aircraft bombs (cabin). Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 17:45 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast.
